title: Stephen Kellogg with Pete Muller
description: A night of music, humor, and storytelling with Stephen Kellogg and special guest Pete Muller. Expect a mix of heartfelt songs and engaging anecdotes.

title: Katy Guillen & The Drive
description: Indie roots rock band from Kansas City, blending garage rock and soulful country torch songs. Their debut album 'Another One Gained' received critical acclaim.

title: Robin Trower
description: Legendary guitarist Robin Trower brings his signature blues-rock sound to Ventura, delivering powerful solos and timeless classics.

title: Kiki Andersen
description: Stand-up comedy night featuring Kiki Andersen, co-headlining with Keith Carey. Prepare for an evening of sharp wit and humor.

title: Colin Hay
description: Colin Hay, known for his work with Men at Work and solo career, performs an intimate solo show filled with storytelling and acoustic renditions of his hits.

title: TheRealTheWarrior
description: TheRealTheWarrior (Jackson Fillmore) brings his unique blend of genres to Ventura, showcasing his latest music and dynamic stage presence.

title: TD Lind and The Aviators
description: An evening of Americana and roots music with TD Lind and The Aviators, featuring Shawn Jones Band. A night of soulful melodies and storytelling.

title: CG5
description: CG5's 'TOO MANY SONGS' tour stops in Ventura, offering fans a high-energy performance filled with his latest hits and fan favorites.

title: Rebirth Brass Band
description: New Orleans' own Rebirth Brass Band brings their infectious blend of jazz, funk, and soul to San Luis Obispo for an unforgettable night.

title: Keller Williams
description: Keller Williams returns to Santa Barbara for an evening of solo acoustic music, looping, and improvisation that defies genre.

title: Benise
description: Benise presents 'Nights of Fire', a theatrical fusion of flamenco, classical, and contemporary music, featuring a live band and dancers.

title: Grateful Shred
description: Grateful Shred delivers a tribute to the Grateful Dead, capturing the spirit and sound of the iconic band with their own twist.

title: Elizabeth Gilbert
description: Author Elizabeth Gilbert discusses her latest work, sharing insights and stories from her writing journey.

title: The Graduates (The Sound of Simon & Garfunkel)
description: The Graduates pay tribute to the timeless music of Simon & Garfunkel, performing their greatest hits with acoustic precision.

title: HAIM
description: Indie pop trio HAIM brings their infectious energy and chart-topping hits to the Santa Barbara Bowl stage.

title: Brick Top Blaggers
description: Celtic punk band Brick Top Blaggers delivers high-energy performances with a mix of traditional and original tunes.

title: Trish Toledo
description: Soul singer Trish Toledo performs her blend of classic and contemporary R&B, captivating audiences with her powerful vocals.

title: Diggin Dirt
description: Funk and soul band Diggin Dirt brings their infectious grooves and dynamic stage presence to Ventura.

title: The Emo Night Tour
description: The Emo Night Tour returns to San Luis Obispo, featuring DJs spinning your favorite emo hits and an unforgettable night of nostalgia.

title: Zongo All-Stars
description: Zongo All-Stars bring their Afro-Cuban rhythms and high-energy performance to San Luis Obispo for a night of dancing and celebration.

title: Eslabon Armado
description: Regional Mexican band Eslabon Armado performs their chart-topping hits, delivering a night of Latin music and culture.
